description: It follows calls for clarity from the public and businesses after Guernsey went into lockdown.
title: Coronavirus: Guernsey officials define 'essential business'
title_page: Coronavirus: Guernsey officials define 'essential business' - BBC News
maintext: "We must slow the spread of the coronavirus by reducing unnecessary physical contact. We need you to make sure that's what happens, and not seek to bend the rules or push the boundaries.
